question: The UK-based CEBR’s 11<sup>th</sup> annual report was recently released. According to the report, in 2019, Indian economy is _______.
explanation: According to the UK-based Centre for Economics and Business Research (CEBR)’s report titled “World Economic League Table 2020”, India has overtaken France and UK to become the fifth-largest economy in 2019. This report also estimated that India might overtake Germany to become the fourth largest economy by 2026 and surpass Japan in 2034 to become the third largest economy.
